data: Below is a list of all the available Block Components within Minecraft:Bedrock Edition for use with Block JSON files.

data.Name: [minecraft:aim_collision](BlockComponents/minecraftBlock_aim_collision.md)
data.Description: The amount of light this block will emit in a range [0.0, 1.0].

data.Name: [minecraft:block_collision](BlockComponents/minecraftBlock_block_collision.md)
data.Description: The amount of light this block will emit in a range [0.0, 1.0].

data.Name: [minecraft:block_light_emission](BlockComponents/minecraftBlock_block_light_emission.md)
data.Description: The amount of light this block will emit in a range [0.0, 1.0].

data.Name: [minecraft:breathability](BlockComponents/minecraftBlock_breathability.md)
data.Description: Property describing the breathability of this block and whether it is treated as a solid or as air.

data.Name: [minecraft:creative_category](BlockComponents/minecraftBlock_creative_category.md)
data.Default Value: Specifies the creative group for the block.
data.Description: Property describing the breathability of this block and whether it is treated as a solid or as air.

data.Name: [minecraft:destroy_time](BlockComponents/minecraftBlock_destroy_time.md)
data.Description: Sets the destroy time property for the block. Greater numbers result in greater mining times.

data.Name: [minecraft:display_name](BlockComponents/minecraftBlock_display_name.md)
data.Description: Specifies the display name id for the block.

data.Name: [minecraft:explosion_resistance](BlockComponents/minecraftBlock_explosion_resistance.md)
data.Description: Sets the explosion resistance for this block.

data.Name: [minecraft:flammable](BlockComponents/minecraftBlock_flammable.md)
data.Description: Describes the flammable properties for this block.

data.Name: [minecraft:friction](BlockComponents/minecraftBlock_friction.md)
data.Description: Property describing the friction for this block. Friction effects an entities movements when it walks on the block.

data.Name: [minecraft:geometry](BlockComponents/minecraftBlock_geometry.md)
data.Description: The geometry definition name to use.

data.Name: [minecraft:loot](BlockComponents/minecraftBlock_loot.md)
data.Default Value: The path to the loot table, relative to the behavior pack.
data.Description: The geometry definition name to use.

data.Name: [minecraft:map_color](BlockComponents/minecraftBlock_map_color.md)
data.Description: A color represented as a hex value. This will be the color rendered to a map.

data.Name: [minecraft:material_instances](BlockComponents/minecraftBlock_material_instances.md)
data.Description: Maps face or material_instance names in a geometry file to an actual material instance. Material instance can either be a full material instance or a name to another already defined instance

data.Name: [minecraft:part_visibility](BlockComponents/minecraftBlock_part_visibility.md)
data.Default Value: Maps bone names in a geometry file to a condition that turns their rendering on/off. The condition should be a Molang query that uses block properties to determine true/false.
data.Description: Maps face or material_instance names in a geometry file to an actual material instance. Material instance can either be a full material instance or a name to another already defined instance

data.Name: [minecraft:placement_filter](BlockComponents/minecraftBlock_placement_filter.md)
data.Description: Sets rules for under what conditions the block can be placed/survive

data.Name: [minecraft:random_ticking](BlockComponents/minecraftBlock_random_ticking.md)
data.Description: Describes the component that will trigger an even at a irregular interval between two values

data.Name: [minecraft:rotation](BlockComponents/minecraftBlock_rotation.md)
data.Description: This is the block's rotation around the center of the cube in degrees. The rotation order is x-y-z.

data.Name: [minecraft:ticking](BlockComponents/minecraftBlock_ticking.md)
data.Description: Describes the component that will trigger an even at a regular interval between two values

data.Name: [minecraft:unit_cube](BlockComponents/minecraftBlock_unit_cube.md)
data.Description: Specifies that a unit cube is to be used with tessellation.

data.Name: [minecraft:unwalkable](BlockComponents/minecraftBlock_unwalkable.md)
data.Description: This component sets a block as unwalkable. Most mobs will not try to jump over it if the value is set to true
